# Sklearn 与 TensorFlow 机器学习实用指南中文版 2018.6.20

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-2018-6-20
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-2018-6-20
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-2018-6-20
sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-2018-6-20 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-erlingyiba-6-erling
sklearn-yu-tensorflow-jiqi-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-zhongwenban-erlingyiba-6-erling <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
